summary: Matso Immersive Sun - a new degree of immersion is now at hand!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-tdWtW3w3lzU/T1dFBXtWa1I/AAAAAAAAB0E/Hjy9gQktirI/s500-c-k/MISlogo.png[/img][/center]
[size=4][color=yellow]NOTE:[/color] This is an essential issue for any mod author - check out [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/719025-originalfirst-mod-subsetmodificationinclusion-of-the-original-mods-and-endorsement]here[/url]![/size]

[url=http://www.gameranx.com/features/id/12098/article/before-dragonborn-top-10-must-have-mods-for-skyrim-in-2013/]:)[/url]

Simple and quick remastering of the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7654]Realistic Lighting[/url] sun textures. Best to use it with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5587]Skyrim Visual Immersion[/url].

[b]Installation[/b]

1. Backup sun textures in [SteamDir]\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\sky.
2. Put the archive content into the [SteamDir]\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\ directory.

You can also use Nexus Mod Manager to install the mod.

[b]Deinstallation[/b]

Delete the mod sun textures (from [SteamDir]\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\sky directory) and restore those backuped during the installation.

---
Bless You All 
MK
author: Matso
